name: Kill The Robot!
description:
Robots, Hillbillies and Hotrods.
Start your engines!

A world famous father/son racing team decide to take matters into their own hands when the world is suddenly invaded by inter-dimensional alien robot monsters.

Hop in your trusty ute (or hotrod) for a bit of silly fun by collecting robot parts, using the alien technology to unlock new vehicles and weapons, killing the robots and saving the world!

This game is still in a very early stage and is a prototype made in about 5 weeks with 2 people. We would love to hear from you if you had a play of Kill The Robot! 

So if you have a spare minute please feel free to suggest new features, let us know if you like this kind of thing, express your likes / dislikes, or if there anything you would love to see in the game!
